      private FlatMatrix<Pool> Connections.potentialPools
      Store the set of all inputs that are within each column's potential pool.
      Methods in org.numenta.nupic.model that return FlatMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlatMatrix<Pool> Connections.getPotentialPools()

    • Uses of FlatMatrix in org.numenta.nupic.util

      Subinterfaces of FlatMatrix in org.numenta.nupic.util 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SparseMatrix<T>
      Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
      Classes in org.numenta.nupic.util that implement FlatMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFlatMatrix<T>
      Base class for flat Matrix implementations.
      class  AbstractSparseBinaryMatrix
      Base class for matrices containing specifically binary (0 or 1) integer values
      class  AbstractSparseMatrix<T>
      Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
      class  BitSetMatrix
      FlatMatrix implementation that store booleans in a BitSet.
      class  FastConnectionsMatrix
      Fast implementation of SparseBinaryMatrix for use as ConnectedMatrix in Connections
      class  FlatArrayMatrix<T>
      FlatMatrix implementation that store objects in a flat object array.
      class  LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix
      Low Memory implementation of SparseBinaryMatrix without a backing array.
      class  SetSparseMatrix
      SparseMatrix implementation that use a Set to store indexes.
      class  SparseBinaryMatrix
      Implementation of a sparse matrix which contains binary integer values only.
      class  SparseObjectMatrix<T>
      Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
